verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> I was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> and I was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for her with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>fury.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I am <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H571>truth;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> There shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> old <S%H2205>men<s%> and old <S%H2205>women<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4938>staff<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H4480>very<s%> <S%H7230><s%> <S%H3117>age.<s%>
And the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3206>boys<s%> and <S%H3207>girls<s%> <S%H7832>playing<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> thereof.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> it be <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> should it <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in mine <S%H5869>eyes?<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H4480>country,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and from the <S%H3996>west<s%> <S%H8121><s%> <S%H4480>country;<s%> <S%H776><s%>

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them, and they shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> Let your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> ye that <S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> by the <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the foundation of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> was <S%H3245>laid,<s%> that the <S%H1964>temple<s%> might be <S%H1129>built.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7939>hire<s%> for <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> any <S%H7939>hire<s%> for <S%H929>beast;<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> was there any <S%H7965>peace<s%> to him that went <S%H3318>out<s%> or came <S%H935>in<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6862>affliction:<s%> for I <S%H7971>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

But <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> be unto the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as in the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H7965>prosperous;<s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and the <S%H776>ground<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> their <S%H2919>dew;<s%> and I will <S%H853>cause<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5157>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things.

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H834>as<s%> ye <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H3467>save<s%> you, and ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing:<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> but let your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H834>As<s%> I <S%H2161>thought<s%> to <S%H7489>punish<s%> you, when your <S%H1>fathers<s%> provoked me to <S%H7107>wrath,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and I <S%H5162>repented<s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> have I <S%H2161>thought<s%> in <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to do <S%H3190>well<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye <S%H408>not.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do;<s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> ye every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> <S%H8199>execute<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> in your gates: <S%H8179><s%>

And let <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> of you <S%H2803>imagine<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H7621>oath:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are things <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H8130>hate,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> The <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> month, and the <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%> and the <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh,<s%> and the <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H6224>tenth,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and <S%H2896>cheerful<s%> <S%H4150>feasts;<s%> therefore <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> It shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> come to pass, <S%H834>that<s%> there shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%>

And the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> city shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H259>another,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let us go <S%H1980>speedily<s%> <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H2470>pray<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

Yea, <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and to <S%H2470>pray<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> it shall come to pass, <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> shall take <S%H2388>hold<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3956>languages<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> even shall take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of the <S%H3671>skirt<s%> of <S%H376>him<s%> that is a <S%H3064>Jew,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> We will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you: <S%H3588>for<s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> you.
